text: The Squaw Man is a 1914 American western movie directed by Cecil B. DeMille (who also stars) and Oscar Apfel and is the first version of the 1905 play of the same name by Edwin Milton Royle. It stars Dustin Farnum, Monroe Salisbury, Lillian St. Cyr, Winifred Kingston, William Elmer, Fred Montague and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1914 movies Category:1910s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Cecil B. DeMille Category:Movies directed by Oscar Apfel Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in Wyoming
title: The Squaw Man (1914 movie)
